content.prompt: Gerard’s description of “corne” in the excerpt best reflects which of the following?

choices.label: Curiosity about American Indian ways of life
Assumptions about the superiority of European culture
Inability to find uses for North American crops
Concerns about economic threats posed by North American imports

topic.text: 1.6: Cultural Interactions Between Europeans, Native Americans, and Africans

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
